QuestData.Title: Down to Business
QuestData.Description: Time to get to business, $n. We cannot afford to tarry.$b$bWhile we are not setting up for a prolonged engagement, we must still have a war camp of some sorts. I do not expect the Nightborne to stay patiently in their city while we plant stakes.$b$bThey are starting to build their defenses. Go in there and see what we are up against. You will strike them from within while we finalize our preparations.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the Grand Promenade and slay $1oa defenders.
